name: Space Hero (Antstar609)
description:
IT'S A STUDENT PROJECT

You must destroy all asteroids and survive as long as you can ! 

There are several waves, the first one has 5 asteroids, once you have destroyed all the asteroids in the wave a second one will appear with 5 new asteroids.

When an asteroid is destroyed it splits into 2 smaller ones.

You have 3 lives and you will lose one if you are hit by an asteroid, once hit you are invincible for 3 seconds but you can't fire.

Once the 3 lives lost the game is over.

A large destroyed asteroid brings 20 points and a small one 50 points.

Controls :

Left click : Fire 

Right click : Reload Escape : Pause
